    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Random motion of gas particles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gelegentliche Bewegung der Gaspartikel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement aléatoire des particules de gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento aleatório de partículas do gás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento casuale delle particelle del gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τυχαία κίνηση αέριο των μορίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento al azar de las partículas del gas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the gas particles moving about in all directions, colliding with the walls of the container and with each other.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">collisions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">material properties</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">random motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Gaspartikel, die 
ungefähr in allen Richtungen bewegen und stößt mit den Wänden des 
Behälters und mit einander zusammen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les particules de gaz se
déplaçant environ dans toutes les directions, se heurtant les murs 
du récipient et l'un l'autre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as partículas do gás 
que movem-se aproximadamente em todos os sentidos, colidindo com as 
paredes do recipiente e com se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le particelle del gas 
che si muovono circa in tutti i sensi, scontrantesi con le pareti del 
contenitore e con a vicenda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει αέριο μόρια 
τριγυρνώντας σε όλες τις κατευθύνσεις, συγκρομένος με τους 
τοίχους του εμπορευματοκιβωτίου και η μια με την άλλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las partículas del gas
que se mueven alrededor en todas las direcciones, chocando con las 
paredes del envase y con uno a.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
